recipe_rough_step_localization_0.question: Which of these time segments belongs to the Mushroom Risotto recipe step Stir in chopped chestnut mushrooms, chopped shiitake mushrooms, and the dried mushrooms in this video?

recipe_rough_step_localization_1.question: Which of these time segments belongs to the Banana Bread Chocolate Chip Cookies recipe step Use a cookie scoop or a spoon to scoop out about 1 inch dough balls. Place 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheet in this video?

recipe_rough_step_localization_2.question: Which of these time segments belongs to the Bacon and Egg Sandwich recipe step Heat half the oil in a large frying pan, add bacon and cook, turning occasionally, until browned and cooked to your liking (3-4 minutes for semi-crisp) in this video?

recipe_rough_step_localization_3.question: Which of these time segments belongs to the Carbonara with Side Salad recipe step Pour the Parmesan eggs into the pan, and keep everything moving, loosening with splashes of the pasta cooking water until you have a silky sauce. recipe_rough_step_localization_4.question: Which of these time segments belongs to the Crispy Cucumber Salad recipe step Add 2 teaspoons of chilli crisp - or more if you dare! Taste and add, taste and add! in this video?

recipe_rough_step_localization_5.question: Which of these time segments belongs to the Banana Bread Chocolate Chip Cookies recipe step In a large bowl, combine the melted butter and sugar. Mix to combine in this video?

recipe_rough_step_localization_6.question: Which of these time segments belongs to the Dal Makhani with Rice recipe step In the morning, drain the water in which the dal and rajma was soaked. Transfer the dal and rajma to a pressure cooker with 1 teaspoon salt. Add around 3.5 cups water. Cook in the pressure cooker on high-medium heat for 10 whistles, then lower the heat to low-medium and cook for another 10 minutes. In total around 15 to 20 whistles in this video?

recipe_rough_step_localization_33.question: Which of these time segments belongs to the Sfesiha (Lebanese Meat Pies) recipe step In a large bowl mix together flour, salt and then add oil.
